entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then north 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 19 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Light snow ending overnight then cloudy. Blowing snow. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the morning. Blowing snow early in the morning. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
